body_html:
@maxfiedler thanks for the code. I see the problem now. First session.run invokes summaries. I can think of a couple workaround. One of the is using MonitoredSession.run_step_fn(...) (@isaprykin ). This is a new utility. You can find it at head.

def step_fn(step_context):
  if handle_train is None:
    handle_train, handle_val = sess.run([iter_train_handle, iter_val_handle])
  return step_context.run_with_hooks(fetches=..., feed_dict=...)
